reviewText: Arrived on time and in good condition. I tried a few of his ideas and they worked great. Not fast paced and very repetitive but that is the point.

I really want to "go organic." Following Jerry's recipes is a good starting point. I cancelled my lawn service this year because I don't want my grandchildren playing in grass that has been treated with chemicals. My husband and I have tried several of the recipes. My old dogwood tree and my flowering crabapple tree look better than they have in years. Thanks, Jerry.
